body_html:
I think we are missing a CPU arg here, we may need to tell bazel that it needs to build for arm CPUs.
Could you try adding flags:

--cpu=armeabi
--crosstool_top=@local_config_arm_compiler//:toolchain
body_text:
I think we are missing a CPU arg here, we may need to tell bazel that it needs to build for arm CPUs.
Could you try adding flags:
--cpu=armeabi
--crosstool_top=@local_config_arm_compiler//:toolchain
body:
I think we are missing a CPU arg here, we may need to tell bazel that it needs to build for arm CPUs.
Could you try adding flags:
```
--cpu=armeabi
--crosstool_top=@local_config_arm_compiler//:toolchain
```
